name: antisocial
content:

C1 harmful to society: antisocial behaviour Increasingly, smoking is regarded as an antisocial habit.
C1 often avoiding spending time with other people: I hope they won't think I'm antisocial if I don't join them in the bar.
More examplesFewer examplesAlmost overnight, that sweet little child had turned into an antisocial monster.There's a problem of antisocial behaviour among teenagers in the town.They have very antisocial neighbours who play music all night and leave rubbish everywhere.Sport and other clubs keep young people from becoming involved in vandalism and other antisocial activities.Surely religion ought to prevent people behaving in an antisocial and immoral way?

harmful to society: Some critics argued that movies caused antisocial behavior.
Antisocial also means not wanting to spend time with or be friendly with other people: If you don’t hang out with your friends, they’ll consider you weird and antisocial.
